plot: When Damien is haunted by dark memories from his past, he must decide whether to revisit a repressed tragedy in his past, or risk losing his future with Bella.
title: Echo
plot_es: When Damien is haunted by dark memories from his past, he must decide whether to revisit a repressed tragedy in his past, or risk losing his future with Bella.
plot_en: When Damien is haunted by dark memories from his past, he must decide whether to revisit a repressed tragedy in his past, or risk losing his future with Bella.
